name: dreamscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view or image that is or looks like something seen in a dream, or a work of art that represents this: In these movies, Freudian dreamscapes provided the backdrop for moral conflicts. He paints coastal landscapes, part memory, part dreamscape.
More examplesFewer examplesThe stage set shows his home as a symbolic dreamscape—a comfortable armchair on a strangely-shaped rug on a floating floor.The film is a tale of youth, set in a dreamscape that mixes memory with fantasy. This piece evokes a surrealist dreamscape as well as a Japanese garden.Our sleeping brain allows us to wander safely through an ominous dreamscape. While her sculpture is grounded in daily life, his universe is crafted of dreamscape.
